title: Nordland Fotballkrets
text:
The Nordland Fotballkrets "(Nordland Football Association)" is one of the 18 district organisations of the <a href="Norwegian%20Football%20Federation">Norwegian Football Federation</a>. It administers lower tier <a href="association%20football">football</a> in the <a href="Districts%20of%20Norway">traditional district</a> of <a href="Helgeland">Helgeland</a> and <a href="Salten">Salten</a>.
Background.
Nordland Fotballkrets, is the governing body for football in the <a href="Districts%20of%20Norway">traditional district</a> of <a href="Helgeland">Helgeland</a> and <a href="Salten">Salten</a>, which covers the southern and mid parts of <a href="Nordland">Nordland</a> county. The Association currently has 98 member clubs. Based in <a href="Bod%C3%B8">Bodø</a>, the Association's chairman is Ernst Pedersen.
Affiliated Members.
The following 98 clubs are affiliated to the Nordland Fotballkrets:
League competitions.
Nordland Fotballkrets run the following league competitions:
Men's football.
<a href="4.%20divisjon">4. divisjon</a> - one section
5. divisjon - one section
6. divisjon - two sections
Women's football.
2. divisjon - one section
